report.title: Explore records 2 for NE NNRs
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord with NE NNRs region filter.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id JOIN locations l on l.id=o.location_id and l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values qty on qty.occurrence_id=o.id and qty.occurrence_attribute_id=93 and qty.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values unit on unit.occurrence_id=o.id and unit.occurrence_attribute_id=138 and unit.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(o.public_geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) AND (#ownData#=0 OR CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying)='#currentUser#') AND (o.survey_id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0) AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND ('#records#'='all' OR ('#records#'=o.record_status) OR '#records#'='C' AND o.record_status='S') #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=o.taxon_group_id AND ('#taxon_groups#'='0' OR tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: region
param.join: JOIN location_attribute_values region on region.location_id=l.id and region.location_attribute_id=37 and region.deleted=false and region.int_value=#region#

param.name: records
param.lookup_values: all:All records,V:Verified records,D:Dubious records,R:Rejected records,C:Records awaiting check

param.name: historic
param.lookup_values: all:All records,modern:Modern records only,historic:Historic records only

joins.join: JOIN sample_attribute_values savhist on savhist.sample_id=o.sample_id and savhist.sample_attribute_id=409 and savhist.int_value=1
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savhist on savhist.sample_id=o.sample_id and savhist.sample_attribute_id=409 and savhist.int_value=1

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END
